website_summaries.verdict: Reasonably priced cotton hat with durable polyester mesh veil and drawstring ties can be worn with regular clothing or a bee suit.
pros: No need to purchase separate hat, but veil can also be worn with helmet
Polyester drawstrings tie securely around torso to hold veil down and keep bees out
Can open veil by pulling it down over brim for a quick drink of water or to wipe face
Frame holds veil well away from face
cons: Peripheral vision not as good as with other round or square veils

customer_reviews.title: Fraud. Not as pictured. Cheap.
customer_reviews.text: This veil is CHEAP and not at all what is pictured. I tried to return the item but had trouble locating a package that it would fit in. So, now I am stuck with this garbage. My fault. However, what I received typically sell for $9. I ordered and paid for the item in the photo. This does not tie down but has cheap, elastic that goes under arms. What this results in, in NC humidity, is terrible chaffing. The veil also blocks anything below so you are constantly readjusting to be able to see clearly. Maybe for a casual bystander but not for someone actively working a hive.
customer_reviews.author: K. Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Seller should include tie on diagram so newbeeks dont have do so much trail n error on best way to tie on
customer_reviews.text: Came on time as advertized. Under arm strap broke on second day of use. If tied properly dont need arm strap any ways. Seller should include tie on diagram so newbeeks dont have do so much trail n error on best way to tie on. I meen you get this 10ft piece of rope with no directions lol. Could hang yourself hahaha.
customer_reviews.author: Shadrachwells

customer_reviews.title: Protective
customer_reviews.text: Very good veil to protect yourself from bees. The string is helpful to tighten so the bees do not crawl up by your head. Got stung about 6 six times in the face and head without the veil. Once I put it on I did not get stung once. I used it when I transfer my bees from the NUC to the hive.
customer_reviews.author: Levi

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I hate the clostaphobic feeling when a zipper gets jammed & with this hat the elastic veil pulls down & back in place quickly.
customer_reviews.author: ALBERTA CRICKET ROY

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this veil!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this veil. Easy to put over whatever clothes you’ve got on. Nice stiff brim keeps the screen all the way off your face (unlike others I’ve used). The pull down is nice for a quick drink of water. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: HunterHouse

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: The two elastic straps may come off the veil early on; you may want to enforce it preventively. This veil is not for the professional, but as backup, or low demand, a fair buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Cloudbuster

customer_reviews.title: Elastic for arms stretched
customer_reviews.text: One side of the attached elastic for the arms is already stretched (other reviews have said attachments were loose or stretched so it wasn't a big surprise). What is the loop on the back for? If its for looping the cord you will never be able to put the veil on by yourself. The cords should have been attached in the back so you can reach back to pull them to the front to a ring and then tie off at the waist.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I got it right on time and tried it out right away. The hood protected me well against bees and I was able to work without the fear that the wind would blow the net on my face and allow the bees to sting me. The rope that came with it was too long but that was an easy fix and now I have a good bit of cord for anything that I might need to tie down.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: It fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the larger size. Sometimes large isn't. This large is perfect for a big guy/gal.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly for our Halloween costumes for trunk or treat.
customer_reviews.author: Sbaker235

customer_reviews.title: Halloween costume
customer_reviews.text: We got these to go with our Halloween costumes.. they will be perfect. Not sure how they would be if you are an actual bee keeper though..
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Great and cool product and will buy more when I need them.
customer_reviews.text: So nice to not have to burn up in a really hot bee suit just to do quick checks of the hives.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Rankin

customer_reviews.title: "Leaks" bees
customer_reviews.text: Bees were able to get into the veil through the elastic top. It didn't really bother me, but then my husband was the one wearing it hahahaha
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Good materials, quality feel
customer_reviews.text: Good quality veil, only a few very sneaky bees can crawl up by the small gap under the chin. 99% effective
customer_reviews.author: Chris T

product_meta.title: Forest Beekeeping Supply - Beekeeping Veil - Pull-Out Veil with Round Hat - Professional Beekeeping Veil/Hat Combo for Protection During Hive Maintenance
product_meta.description: Premium quality One Size Fit All beekeeping veil from Forest Beekeeping Supply. The light weight cotton Fabric with Polyester mesh provides complete protection against angry bee stings. If you've ever worn a veil and just needed to grab a drink or brush the sweat out of your eyes, this veil is just what you've been looking for. Simply pull your veil over the brim of your hat or helmet for easy access - no more unzipping multiple zippers! Mesh allows for ventilation and protection Easy to pull down over the brim of your hat or helmet, No more messing with multiple zippers! Hand wash cold, line dry, Secure the veil under your arms and across your chest with two long durable polyester cords. The built-in hat does not require a separate helmet. Beekeeping Jacket is Sold Separately.
